Delete the reminder Family Function in the reminder app

Click on button with the text "Family Function"
Click on button with the text "Delete"
Click on button with the text "YES"
Check status: successful

Search for the reminder My favourite Cusines in the Reminder app

Click on button with the text "Search"
Type text: My favourite Cusines
Check status: successful

<image>
Open the reminder app and snooze the Kids School PTM reminder by 10 minutes.

Wait for response
Click on point (265,366)
Click on button with the text "10"
Click on button with the text "Snooze"
Check status: successful

I will set the reminder on repeat to buy New Balance hiking shoes on the Schedule Planner app.

Click on button with the text "No"
Click on button with the text "Daily"
Click on button with the text "DONE"
Check status: successful

<image>

<image>
<image>
Since the task of buying New Balance hiking shoes is done, I will mark it as complete on the To-Do reminder app.

Click on point (394,501)
Click on button with the text "Complete"
Click on button with the text "OK"
Check status: successful
